website_summaries.verdict: Parents and grandparents who grew up watching Mister Rogers will like having this realistic trolley model as a conversational piece.
pros: Includes popular puppet characters and a blank tile for customization
cons: Wheels may not fit standard track pieces
Some assembly defects noted, including uneven wheels and cracked wood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love Mr Rogers Neighborhood and their favorite part is the Trolley. This was an amazing kids version so I had to get it for them! They love playing with it and holding it while the episodes play. A perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Valles

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Rogers would be proud!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully painted. Well made. This is last after our kiddos have outgrown it.
customer_reviews.author: svea bryan

customer_reviews.title: Won't you be my neighbor?
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the trolley Mr. Rodgers had on his show. I don't have a use for the wood piece characters. Great as a conversation piece and sturdy enough for children to play with it
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I think it'll make his workspace seem a bit more fun and provide a comforting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my adult brother to have as a toy in his office since he is still such a huge Mr. Roger's fan. It was a big hit! I think it'll make his workspace seem a bit more fun and provide a comforting, familiar sight for his patients. The trolley is very lovely and seems to be of excellent quality. The wooden figures that come with it seem a bit corny, and I would have liked for it to have a ringing bell, but I mostly purchased it for decoration anyways.
customer_reviews.author: cseim

customer_reviews.title: It was a beautiful day in my neighborhood
customer_reviews.text: The trolly is well-made, accurate to the details of the original, and will be a nice addition to my collection of various odds and ends, including Mr. Rogers' memorabilia.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ellingham

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic quality wood toy. This is a classic piece that children can enjoy for generations. It is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Prince of Paradise

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Craftsmanship but...
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love it. But I was hoping when I bought it that it would be more like a toy. I would like the trolley to have a bell that clangs like a real trolley bell. Would like the little people figures that were included to be more lifelike little people & not flat. My grandsons don't play with it as much as they might if it had these features included. The craftsmanship of the trolley was exceptional!
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Sarpolis

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Such a quality and nostalgic toy. My daughter loves Mister Roger's through the gateway of Daniel Tiger and she just loves having her very own trolley.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kennerson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and realistic neighborhood toy
customer_reviews.text: Adorable solid wood trolley that my 4 year old went wild for. Looks so much like the real thing. Just wish it had realistic looking toys to go along with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Rogers' toy was great
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is in love with Mr. Rogers and his show. He loved having his own trolly. Since it is made of wood, it is plenty sturdy for a rough little boy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Thornton

customer_reviews.title: This Trolley is fun to play with.
customer_reviews.text: Daniel was my grandsons favorite TV character last year. I originally bought this toy for that reason. The trolley is a very nice, It's well made and easily incorporated into any child's imaginative play, My only suggestion would be to improve the three characters included with the trolley from a small cube with the likeness of each character printed on it to easy to handle appropriately sized figures.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: Great old school toy. Seems just as sturdy as the one my brother had as a kid. My nephew enjoys playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Bushey

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic product that is very well mad
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic product that is very well mad, and it feels so right that my mother burst into sentimental tears when she saw it siting on my shelf.
customer_reviews.author: KingFrak

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting one of these ever since I learned they exist. It was like Christmas when it got here and I am absolutely loving it.
customer_reviews.author: JayDee Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy trolley
customer_reviews.text: Authentic looking trolley, great for kids who love the new Daniel Tiger animated kids show that is so popular now The toy is a little heavy and well made. I think my grandaughter will love it!
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Holgate Classic Trolley
customer_reviews.text: I loved this! I bought this for my grandson ever since he's discovered Daniel Tiger. It's a real keepsake.My only complaint is that the characters were on flat pieces of wood instead of cutout figures but it's still very, very cute.
customer_reviews.author: plrayman

customer_reviews.title: The classic trolley is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: It is well made and very sturdy. Our granddaughter likes to use it when she watches Mister Rogers. We taped tiny front & back pictures of our granddaughter onto the blank wooden "passenger" piece so that she can pretend she's riding on the trolley too.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality. If only all manufacturer's took pride in their products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon2

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my fiance because this was always his favorite part of Mr. Rogers and he loved it! Not only does it look exactly like the real thing but the package also came in safely and very fast! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: jaxster72

customer_reviews.title: Loved it and it is Made in America
customer_reviews.text: A win-win. Perfect toy for the kid who loves Mr Rogers, and who doesn't? Well made and sturdy. Great toy
customer_reviews.author: PattyS

customer_reviews.title: Childhood Memories
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy to play with. Although I received it damaged (I think their packaging could be better designed), I contacted the company and they were very nice and acted immediately in sending me another trolley, free of charge. I would highly recommend this company for anyone searching for this product.
customer_reviews.author: kirudy2

customer_reviews.title: Just What She Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Solidly, USA made. A keepsake toy that my grand child will enjoy for a very long time. A great gift for any child.
customer_reviews.author: Other Hand

customer_reviews.title: Very Special
customer_reviews.text: This is very good quality.and a delight to any child that loves Daniel Tiger. I would give this as a gift again.
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: You won't find a better trolly!
customer_reviews.text: Well made for the price, my daughter loves it. You won't find a better trolly!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Echevarria

customer_reviews.title: Love Mr. Rogers Trolley
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter watches Daniel Tigers Neighborhood on TV and she is going to be very happy on Christmas morning. It's great quality and adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Dinkfelt

customer_reviews.title: Trolley
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson is thrilled with this toy, it inspires his imagination!!!Daniel Tiger is his favorite character on the PBS channel
customer_reviews.author: Anna Kuzyk

customer_reviews.title: Completely Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality wooden toy. Flippin' adorable. There's only one person in the whole world like you. And people can like you exactly how you are.
customer_reviews.author: E. K. Chow

customer_reviews.title: A quality toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy. It is extremely well made, solid--looks just like the one on TV. It's a little pricey, but it comes with a lifetime warranty. If at any time the toy breaks, you can send it back to be repaired.
customer_reviews.author: mommy of 2 boys

product_meta.title: Pepperell Mister Rogers' Trolley Set: Wood, Includes 1 Trolley and 4 Neighborhood Friends, 11 x 3.5 x 6.5 Inches, Multicolor
product_meta.description: It’s a beautiful day in the neighborhood! You can welcome guests into Mister Rogers' Neighborhood with this 6-piece trolley set. Along with the wood crafted trolley, this set comes with a fold-out neighborhood map and four wooden neighborhood friends, who are delighted to come join your play area. Gift this trolley set to children ages 3 and up to engage their creative and learning abilities. Trolley measures 11 inches long, 3.5 inches wide and 6.5 inches tall. Each wooden character block measures 1.25 inches wide and 2.25 inches tall. The fold out neighborhood map measures 7 x 21.25 inches. 6 pieces per set.
feature_bullets: 6-Piece set – this Mister rogers’ trolley set includes one 11 x 3. 5 x 6. 5-Inch wooden trolley, 3 pre-printed wood character blocks, 1 blank wood character block, and one fold-out map.

Decorative and functional – constructed of durable wood that is sure to last, This Mr. Rogers’ trolley replica features functional wheels for smooth coasting around the neighborhood and designated slots that perfectly fit the included character blocks.

Wood character blocks – set includes King Friday, Daniel Tiger and Queen Sara pre-printed on 1. 25 x 2. 25-Inch wooden blocks, and one blank character block so you can use your imagination to design your own friend to bring to the land of make-believe!
Fold out map – the included map folds out to 7 x 21. 5 inches and boasts a colorful and whimsical design of Mister rogers’ neighborhood that creates an imaginative play place.

Fun for ages 3 and up – this beautifully crafted wooden trolley set is memorable for parents and grandparents alike. Gift this set to children for a fun and imaginative way to relive the experience. Intended for ages 3 and up.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars53 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
